extendedInfo.description: College Students, keep Amazon.com in your back pocket. The Amazon Student App allows instant price-checks on textbooks and more. Simply scan a barcode to check a price, or use one-click access to scan items you want to buy or sell back. Amazonâs convenient trade-in program can turn your books, games, movies, and electronics into Amazon Gift Cards. Plus, join Amazon Student to get FREE Two-Day Shipping for six months with Amazon Prime shipping benefits!Included in the Amazon Student App:- Instant Price Checks: Scan a barcodeâcheck a price: Itâs that easy. Shop smarter and compare prices on textbooks and everything else you buy, no matter where you are. Access Amazon.comâs low prices and vast selection to buy books, music, DVDs, electronics, apparel, and just about anything else from your phone.- Sell Your Stuff: Turn your used stuff into Amazon.com Gift Cards. Just scan a textbook, game, movie, or gadget you no longer need and see the trade-in value for any eligible item. Ship it for free and get an Amazon.com Gift Card to spend on millions of items on Amazon.com.- FREE Two-Day Shipping: The Amazon Student program offers college students FREE Two-Day Shipping for six months with Amazon Prime shipping benefits.

reviews.title: Partially useful
reviews.comment: In regard to the trade in feature: Selling unopened new DVDs is worth it because of the absence of shipping costs and wait time on the seller\'s part. Like new and Good DVDs are not worth the effort or trade in value. Books, only college level, required and current for this semester are worth the trade in value. Any book that isn\'t a textbook or is a remotey old textbook, is not worth even scanning. If you have these very precise goods, use this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why a separate app?
reviews.comment: Wonderfully brilliant app however why a different app. Would be cool to customize your amazon home. Great stuff at rediculously low prices. Thank you for the free prime shipping.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very beneficial
reviews.comment: I use this app all the time, not just for school. I would put five stars but sometimes it tells me that there aren\'t any search results when I Know there are.
reviews.author: Kendra Williamson

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Amazon gave me a trade-in value of $63 for one of my college textbooks. Just scan it and they will tell you the value, if you like the amount you will receive, then you ship the book to them for free, Thank you Amazon! :)
reviews.author: Brian L

reviews.title: Almost there...
reviews.comment: Pretty great with buying, but I\'m also a seller. I want to have a way to sell from my phone without having to \"trade\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WAS GREAT BUT
reviews.comment: The barcode scanner stopped working.  It pulls up a black screen. The price quotes you first get on trade in are good. But then you check your trade-in list and its WAY lower than what you were offered the first time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for students
reviews.comment: Campus bookstores will rip you off at the end of the semester. Do yourself a favor and see how much Amazon will give you for your books. I also used this for old video games. Got a fair amount of money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: We love it is the best and you can find anythig and everythig
reviews.comment: P
reviews.author: Carolina Varona

reviews.title: Great, but still has issues
reviews.comment: This app makes looking for things on Amazon pretty fast and easy. My only complaint is that the barcode scanner does not work. All I get is a black screen everytime I try to use it. I have another app with a barcode scanner and that one works fine, so I know that my phone is not the problem.
reviews.author: TJ Lewis

reviews.title: Amazon\'s Best App!
reviews.comment: Very useful and convenient but I can\'t help but think that it can be so much better. I challenge Amazon to impress us! 5 star rating cause I love it so much! Update: The regular Amazon app has quite a few things that this app doesn\'t. I would like those features and I think all these other people also do. Minus 1 star for lagging it. Get to work! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: College student
reviews.comment: I just started as a college student and this is very helpful, prices are way lower than in my campus\' book store
reviews.author: Jesus Padilla

reviews.title: why cant this app be installed on s4
reviews.comment: I just got a galaxy s4 and i tried to install this app on the phone and i cant....i love this app due to that im a student and like to get textbooks through this app and it disappoints me that i cannot install the app on my phone...amazon, fix this and i will rewrite my review
reviews.author: Ben Graefser

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: This app is cool cause you can do a bar scan on everything. Just scan it, add it, and you\'re  good to go
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazon
reviews.comment: Great app, but too similar to the non-student Amazon version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It doesn\'t accept any regular books and DVDs it only offered 80 cents. Don\'t waste ur time unless u have text books
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Login Broken
reviews.comment: This was one of my favorite apps until it quit working yesterday. It just keeps looping back to the login screen when I  enter my password. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling and it still won\'t work. What\'s up with that?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice, but...
reviews.comment: The bar code scanner is the worst I\'ve ever encountered in a mobile app. Please fix.
reviews.author: James Bowen

reviews.title: DogScratch
reviews.comment: Easily traded my books in with this app. Must have for students.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: The barcode scanner doesn\'t work on my Galaxy S3... bummer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.comment: Really not a great app. Kind of disappointing compared to the other Amazon apps.
reviews.author: A Google User
